info.title: OPERA Cloud Room Rotation Configuration Service API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Room Rotation Configuration functionality in OPERA Cloud. Api provides capability to handle Room Rotation in OPERA Cloud. Room Rotation provides room ownership options for automatic inventory rotation and prioritization for owner rooms assignment and occupancy.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.
